data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
It seems as if Joao Carlos Teixeira is unable to continue. Nicolai Jorgensen replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 39, Said Bakari is booked for the home team.
The first half has been concluded at Mandemakers Stadion.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Dick Advocaat (Feyenoord) is making a second substitution, with Luciano Narsingh replacing Bryan Linssen.
Dick Advocaat is making the team's third substitution at Mandemakers Stadion with Lutsharel Geertruida replacing Bart Nieuwkoop.
Goal! Waalwijk have got their heads in front thanks to a Cyril Ngonge strike.
In the minute 50, Great play from Vurnon Anita to set up the goal.
Orkun Kokcu (Feyenoord) gets a yellow card.
Nicolai Jorgensen is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 62, Feyenoord make their fourth substitution with Christian Joe Conteh replacing Nicolai Jorgensen.
Uros Spajic (Feyenoord) has received a yellow card from Jochem Kamphuis.
At Mandemakers Stadion, Anas Tahiri has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Cyril Ngonge with Lennerd Daneels. This is the first substitution made today by Fred Grim.
Ola John is replacing Vitalie Damascan for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
Ayman Azhil is on a sub for Anas Tahiri for Waalwijk.
In the minute 80, Waalwijk take a 2-1 lead thanks to Ola John.
Jordy Wehrmann is replacing Orkun Kokcu for the away team.
Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through Ridgeciano Haps.
In the minute 84, Steven Berghuis with an assist there.
Finn Stokkers is replacing Nicolas Olsak for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
The home team replace Sylla Sow with Richard van der Venne.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
